mapper.select: SELECT CMMN_CODE_GROUP, CMMN_CODE, CMMN_CODE_NM, CMMN_CODE_DC, USE_YN, UPPER_CMMN_CODE FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CMMN_CODE_GROUP='DEPARTMENT' AND USE_YN='Y'
SELECT CMMN_CODE_GROUP, CMMN_CODE, CMMN_CODE_NM, CMMN_CODE_DC, USE_YN, UPPER_CMMN_CODE FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CMMN_CODE_GROUP='DEPARTMENT' AND CMMN_CODE=#{cmmnCode}

SELECT EMPL_NO, PASSWORD, ENABLED, EMPL_NM, BRTHDY, TELNO, ACNUTNO, BANK_NM, EMAIL, POST_NO, ADRES, DETAIL_ADRES, ECNY_DATE, RETIRE_DATE, ATCH_FILE_NO, ELCTRN_SIGN_IMAGE_URL, PROFL_PHOTO_URL, DEPT_CODE, CLSF_CODE, GENDER_CODE, EMPL_STTUS_CODE, ANSLRY, PARTCLR_MATTER, CONTD_EMPNO FROM EMPLOYEE

SELECT EMPL_NO, PASSWORD, ENABLED, EMPL_NM, BRTHDY, TELNO, ACNUTNO, BANK_NM, EMAIL, POST_NO, ADRES, DETAIL_ADRES, ECNY_DATE, RETIRE_DATE, ATCH_FILE_NO, ELCTRN_SIGN_IMAGE_URL, PROFL_PHOTO_URL, DEPT_CODE, CLSF_CODE, GENDER_CODE, EMPL_STTUS_CODE, ANSLRY, PARTCLR_MATTER, CONTD_EMPNO FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPL_NO=#{emplNo}
SELECT CC.CMMN_CODE_NM FROM COMMON_CODE CC LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON CC.CMMN_CODE = E.DEPT_CODE WHERE CC.CMMN_CODE_GROUP='DEPARTMENT' AND E.EMPL_NO=#{emplNo}
SELECT CC.CMMN_CODE_NM FROM COMMON_CODE CC LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON CC.CMMN_CODE = E.CLSF_CODE WHERE CC.CMMN_CODE_GROUP='POSITION' AND E.EMPL_NO= #{emplNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMON_CODE (CMMN_CODE_GROUP, CMMN_CODE, CMMN_CODE_NM, CMMN_CODE_DC, USE_YN, UPPER_CMMN_CODE, CMMN_CODE_SN) VALUES ('DEPARTMENT', #{cmmnCode}, #{cmmnCodeNm},#{cmmnCodeDc},'Y', #{upperCmmnCode}, #{cmmnCodeSn})
